titleStmt.title: Pathose, or an inward passion of the pope for the losse of hys daughter the masse
titleStmt.author: Shepherd, Luke, fl. 1548, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Iohn Daye and Wylliam Seres,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.

Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
